name: XX
greetingText: I am so luckey to meet the most beautiful in you in my beautiful years
wishText: Your presence is like a gentle breeze that turns the ordinary into something extraordinary
textInChatBox: Very very very very sincerely wish you a happy birthday!!! Lots and lots of happiness
text2: I want to give you a surprise
text3: I thought about it seriously for a long time
text4: I realized that I want to do something
text5Content: You are very special to me
outroText: I hope you enjoy this little surprise! but there is somthing waiting for u tommorow
replayText: If you like it, you can watch it again! Or one
